title: Greyve Art Page
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --header-title: "Greyve Art";
    --header-subtitle: "( ._.)✎";
    --logo-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/greyve-author-page/prismlogo.png");

    --pale-accent: 133, 193, 233;
    --bright-accent: 14, 65, 102;
    --medium-accent: 60, 100, 120;

[[/module]]

[[include component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
@@ @@
**Greyve Art Page**
Mostly icons right now.
@@ @@
[[=]]
For more by me, check out the [[[greyve-author-page|Greyve Page]]]!
[[/=]]
[[include component:ratio-bar pie=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

+* Welcome to the Greyve Art Page!

So basically, I finally made an art page. As of now, it's mostly logos, but I'm sure I'll start adding some actual art over time. 

As explained on [[[greyve-author-page|my author page]]], you can use any content I post onto this site with absolutely no limitations. That includes all of my art, which consists of literally anything on this page. Matter of fact, you can even use my logo at the top of the page if you have a particular interest in both the SCP Foundation and a certain progressive rock band.

You don't even have to credit me if you don't want to, but that would be nice of you to do.

[[tabview]]
[[tab Icons]]
++* Icons

Icons for [[[anomaly-classification-system-guide|ACS]]]. For more custom icons, check out [[[dr-moned-s-icons-and-art|Dr Moned's art page]]]!
-----

||~ Logo ||~ Inspiration ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/greyve-art-page/Decommissioned.png width="250 px"]] || **Decommissioned:** Revived by [[*user Calibold]]. Why did I make my own when he already has one? I like making things complicated for myself.||
[[/tab]]


[[tab Sketches]]
++* Sketches

Sketches of skips, or whatever else, I guess. Feel free to commission a sketch from me for absolutely no cost, with no satisfaction guarantee!
-----

+++* My Stuff
[[module ListPages name="SCP-4937"]]

[[/collapsible]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Other]]
++* Other

Other stuff that I've done. May or may not be related to SCP, but it exists, so...yeah.
-----

+++* [[[scp-achievement-badges|SCP Achievment Badges]]]

||  [[image https://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/f82c6417-b71c-11ea-992b-1b36457c3014.gif width="50 px"]] || **Bard:**Write 10 tales at > +30 each||
||  [[image https://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/d0c9bb54-b71b-11ea-b347-1b36457c3014.gif width="50 px"]] || **Canonball:** Write at least 3 tales set in an official canons > +50 each||
||  [[image https://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/7cbcd000-b71b-11ea-a5d7-1b36457c3014.gif width="50 px"]] || **Hat Trick:** Win as an individual or as part of a winning team in 3 SCP wiki contests||
||  [[image https://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/fd8b2694-b71b-11ea-b3a4-1b36457c3014.gif width="50 px"]] || **Iconic:** Write a page at > +600||
||  [[image https://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/b7f173ba-b71e-11ea-b9a0-1b36457c3014.gif width="50 px"]] || **Level Up!:** Be a member of the SCP Wiki for one calendar year||
||  [[image https://piskel-imgstore-b.appspot.com/img/e71956c0-b71c-11ea-b291-1b36457c3014.gif width="50 px"]] || **Writerbot:** Write 50 pages at > +50 each||
[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
